Package com.islandpower.configurator.model.project

Class ProjectSolarPanel.MonthlySolarData

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.model.project.ProjectSolarPanel.MonthlySolarData
Enclosing class:
ProjectSolarPanel
public static class ProjectSolarPanel.MonthlySolarData extends Object
Inner class to represent solar data for each month.

  • Constructor Details

    • MonthlySolarData

      public MonthlySolarData(int month, Double psh, Double ambientTemperature, double totalDailyEnergy, double requiredEnergy, double requiredPower, double efficiency, double deratedPower, int numPanels, double estimatedDailySolarEnergy)
      Constructor for MonthlySolarData.
      Parameters:
      month - The month number (1-12)
      psh - The Peak Sun Hours
      ambientTemperature - The ambient temperature in degrees Celsius
      totalDailyEnergy - The total daily energy in Wh
      requiredEnergy - The required energy in Wh
      requiredPower - The required power in W
      efficiency - The efficiency factor
      deratedPower - The derated power in W
      numPanels - The number of panels needed
      estimatedDailySolarEnergy - The estimated daily solar energy in Wh
